title: Ardleys Hand Font
content:
Hi,

Anybody know where I can purchase the ’Ardleys Hand’ font. I can’t seem to be able to find it anywhere.

Thanks,

ostorey
author: ostorey

comments.content:
See this page:  
 [http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090725091359/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html")

You’ll find Ardleys listed as an alias for “Lumpy” on the “ClickArt Fonts 3 Deluxe” collection that was sold by [Broderbund.com.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090725091359/http:/www.kqzyfj.com/click-1302360-10373764) I don’t see that product on their website now.
